other_tests.findings: Multiple cysts in the liver and hepatosplenomegaly, with no obvious renal cysts.
Prominent dilation of the intrahepatic bile ducts.
Multifocal dilatation of the intrahepatic bile ducts associated with hepatomegaly. An obvious 'central spot sign' was observed.
Suggested for the child and his parents, but the parents declined due to economic reasons.
